item.title: JRC-MARS Training on Team Foundation Server
item.dc:creator: Ioannis Athanasiadis
item.description: Work Package 2 includes a number of activities which require team development in several software code projects. Some of these projects, in perspective including the activities of Work Package 5, will require interaction with the Joint Research Centre – MARS unit, which is one of the main stakeholders of the project. item.title: MODEXTREME Workshop on Building model components
item.dc:creator: ionathan
item.description: Workshop on building model components – A technical workshop at University of Milan, Italy About The technical workshop on model implementation in MODEXTREME took place at the University of Milan, on July 8 (13:30) to July 10 (13:00). This first workshop was reserved to MODEXTREME participants and primarily dealt with the implementation of model components, […]
